trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for accessing the types, directives, and controls in the current Web project document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para acessar os tipos, as diretivas e os controles no documento do projeto Web atual.

trans-unit.source: This class must be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe deve ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> base class is implemented by designer hosts to provide access to types, directives, and user controls defined in a Web project document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> classe base é implementada por hosts designers para fornecer acesso a tipos, diretivas e controles de usuário definidos em um documento de projeto da Web.

trans-unit.source: A control designer class can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> to access the definitions in the current document, and to add a new tag prefix to the current document.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe do designer de controle pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> para acessar as definições no documento atual e adicionar um novo prefixo de marca para o documento atual.

trans-unit.source: You access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> services supplied by the designer host through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Você acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> serviços fornecidos pelo designer host por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation can be accessed in two ways:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementação pode ser acessada de duas maneiras:

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation supplied by the designer host.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> propriedade para acessar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementação fornecida pelo host do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> implementation is supplied through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> implementação é fornecida por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.ReferenceManager%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.RootDesigner%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Other designer classes can access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementation by first obtaining the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> services implementation through the designer component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>, and then calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A> method using the designer host <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Outras classes de designer podem acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> implementação primeiro obtendo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementação por meio do designer do componente de serviços <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>e, em seguida, chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.GetDesigner%2A> método usando o designer host <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.RootComponent%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> replaces the obsolete interface <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> substitui a interface obsoleta <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager>.

trans-unit.source: Older designer hosts may only support the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager> interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: Hosts mais antigos de designer só podem oferecer suporte a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IWebFormReferenceManager> implementação de interface.

trans-unit.source: Check that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> implementations supplied by the designer host are not `null` to ensure the designer host implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> classes.
trans-unit.target: Verifique se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> implementações fornecidas pelo host do designer não são `null` garantir que o designer host implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> classes.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class is abstract, you cannot create an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> directly using the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> classe é abstrata, não é possível criar uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> diretamente usando o construtor.

trans-unit.source: When deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> class, override the constructor to implement custom initialization actions for your reference manager implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ao derivar do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager> classe, substitua o construtor para implementar as ações de inicialização personalizada para sua implementação da referência do Gerenciador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the register directives for the current project document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as diretivas de registro do documento do projeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A collection of strings representing the register directives defined in the current document.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de cadeias de caracteres que representa as diretivas do registro definidas no documento atual.

trans-unit.source: The type of the object.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the tag prefix for the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o prefixo da marca para o tipo de objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix for the specified object type, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo da marca do tipo de objeto especificado, se encontrado, caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo da marca do tipo a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome da marca do tipo a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object type with the specified tag prefix and tag name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de objeto com o prefixo da marca e o nome da marca especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object with the specified tag prefix and name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do objeto com o prefixo e o nome da marca especificados, se encontrado, caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix of the user control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O prefixo da marca do controle de usuário a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The tag name of the user control to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O nome da marca do controle de usuário a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative URL path for the user control with the specified tag prefix and tag name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho relativo da URL para o controle de usuário com o prefixo da marca e o nome da marca especificados.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the relative URL path for the specified user control, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o caminho relativo da URL para o controle de usuário especificado, se encontrado, caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetUserControlPath%2A> uses the tag prefix and name to locate the user control register directive in the current document, and returns the `src` attribute value defined in the register directive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsReferenceManager.GetUserControlPath%2A> usa o prefixo de marca e o nome para localizar a diretiva de registro de controle de usuário no documento atual e retorna o `src` definido na diretiva register do valor do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The type to add a tag prefix for in the current document.
trans-unit.target: O tipo para o qual um prefixo de marca deve ser adicionado no documento atual.

trans-unit.source: Adds a tag prefix for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um prefixo da marca para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The tag prefix string.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de prefixo de marca.

trans-unit.source: If the tag prefix already exists, then a new register directive is not added.
trans-unit.target: Se o prefixo de marca já existir, uma nova diretiva de registro não é adicionada.
